column3: hom ntsie iyi; Hom a hom tse wiadze nyinara

column2: "M’ano bɛka enyansasɛm; Na m’akoma mu adwendwen ayɛ ntseasee."
"Mebɛbrɛ m’aso adze metsie abɛbusɛm: Mubobue m’asɛm a no mu yɛ sum do wɔ nsankutsen do."
"Ebɛnadze ntsi na munsuro wɔ nda bɔn mu
column3: Aber a m’atweefo emumuyɛ etwa mo ho ehyia?"

column2: "Hɔn a wɔdze hɔn werɛ hyɛ hɔn ahonyadze mu
column3: Na wɔhyehyɛ hɔnho wɔ hɔn adzedodow mu
column6: nyimpa biara runntum mmpon no noho da
column7: Eso onnkotum etua ne tsir do kaw ama Nyankopɔn
column9: "Osiandɛ nyimpa ne kra no pon som bo kɛse
column10: Na dza obotum etua no nnkotum:"

column3: obiara hu dɛ enyansafo mpo wuwu
column4: Na nkwasea na egyimfo nyina so dɛmara
column5: Na wɔdan hɔn ahonyadze gya binom."

column2: "Kaansa wonyinyaa nsaase dze hɔn edzin totoo do mpo a
column3: Hɔn ndakamona nye hɔn tsenabea afebɔɔ; Na hɔ na wɔbɛtsena ekodu mbasantsen nyinara do."

column2: "Na nyimpa n’eyiedzi nnkɛma ɔatsena ase daa: Obowu tse dɛ mbowa ara pɛr."
"Iyi nye nkwaseafo hɔn ewiei: Hɔn a wɔdze hɔn werɛ hyɛ hɔn ahonyadze mu no a."
"Woebua hɔn dɛ nguankuw ama samanadze; Owu na ɔbɛyɛ hɔn guanhwɛfo na ɔdze hɔn akɔ: Na tseneneefo no benya hɔn do tum anapa; Na hɔn dze

column3: Nyankopɔn bɛgye no owu nsamu: Na ɔbɛgye me."

column4: Aber a ne fie enyimnyam rodɔɔ so no:"

column3: ɔremmfa hweeara nnkɔ; N’enyimnyam rinnsian nndzi n’ekyir
column5: "Kaansa ɔtse ase no ohyiraa ne kra
column7: dɛ ɔabɔ noho mbɔdzen mpo a
column10: Bea a worunnhu kan ara bio."

column2: "Nyimpa a ɔwɔ enyidzi mu na onnyi ntseasee no
